title: It’s easier than you think to live stream to YouTube and Twitch from a Mac
content:
The popularity of live streaming has soared since the beginning of 2020. Everything from video games to music to chess is live online from creators with followings large and small. While Macs are not the traditional streaming computer, it is entirely possible to become a successful live streamer on one of these devices.  

more…

The post It’s easier than you think to live stream to YouTube and Twitch from a Mac appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Ever wanted to become a live streamer? Here are a couple simple ways to begin live streaming on YouTube or Twitch from your Mac computer.
